\w The|strong="H8313"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* set fire \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H8313"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8313"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H8313"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8313"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w broke|strong="H5422"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w the|strong="H8313"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w Nebuzaradan|strong="H5018"\w* \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w carried|strong="H1540"\w* \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Babylon \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w had|strong="H2876"\w* \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w deserters|strong="H5307"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w had|strong="H2876"\w* \w defected|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1931"\w* \w Nebuzaradan|strong="H5018"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w behind|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* property, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w fields|strong="H3010"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H7227"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w orders|strong="H6680"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Nebuzaradan|strong="H5018"\w* \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w*, saying,

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w Nebuzaradan|strong="H5018"\w* \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w*, Nebushazban \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Rabsaris|strong="H7249"\w*, \w Nergal-sharezer|strong="H5371"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Rabmag, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* captains \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon

\w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w guard|strong="H4307"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*. \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w confined|strong="H6113"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w guard|strong="H4307"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H1697"\w*:

“\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* tell \w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3569"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* fulfill \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w harm|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* men \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w rescue|strong="H4422"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w war|strong="H2719"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.’”
